name: Africa Tech Summit Kigali
description: A pan-African technology and investment summit connecting founders, developers, and investors.

name: Apple WWDC San Jose
description: Apple WWDC (Worldwide Developers Conference) San Jose is Apple’s annual flagship event for developers worldwide. The conference focuses on software engineering, mobile development, iOS/macOS platforms, AI and machine learning, UX/UI design, and product innovation. WWDC features keynote presentations by Apple executives, technical sessions, coding labs, hands-on workshops, and networking opportunities for developers. The event is hybrid, allowing both in-person attendance in San Jose and virtual participation globally.

name: AWS re:Invent
description: AWS re:Invent is Amazon Web Services’ flagship cloud computing conference held annually in Las Vegas. It gathers tens of thousands of developers, engineers, architects, and business leaders for keynotes, technical sessions, hands-on labs, and networking around the latest in cloud, DevOps, AI, and more.

name: Build With React Native Manchester
description: Build With React Native Manchester is a community-focused meetup for developers interested in React Native, Expo, cross-platform mobile development, and practical hands-on building. The event features live sessions, workshops, and collaboration opportunities for developers across the UK tech ecosystem.

name: Cloud Native Computing Foundation
description: CloudNativeCon is the flagship conference of the Cloud Native Computing Foundation, focusing on cloud-native technologies.

name: Consumer Electronics Show
description: CES is the world's largest and most influential technology trade show, serving as the proving ground for innovators and breakthrough technologies for over five decades. It features major product announcements across more than 40 technology categories, including automotive, digital health, AR/VR, robotics, and smart home. The event attracts global media, high-level executives, and industry professionals. The ticket range reflects the difference between the Exhibits Plus Pass (min) and the Deluxe Conference Pass (max).

name: CVPR
description: The Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) is a leading annual event in computer vision, deep learning, and graphics research.

name: DeepFest Riyadh
description: DeepFest Riyadh is one of the world’s fastest‑growing AI and technology conferences, co‑located with the LEAP Tech Event in Saudi Arabia. Powered by the Saudi Authority for Data and Artificial Intelligence (SDAIA) and organised by Tahaluf & Co., DeepFest brings together AI researchers, developers, innovators, engineers, and decision‑makers from across the globe. The event features keynote sessions, workshops, exhibits, and deep dives into cutting‑edge topics like generative AI, robotics, ethics, and real‑world AI adoption. With over 68,000 attendees in 2025, it has become a key meeting point for the global AI community.

name: DeveloperWeek San Jose
description: DeveloperWeek San Jose is one of the largest developer and engineering technology conferences and expos in the world, featuring workshops, keynotes, hackathons, and multi‑track technical sessions focused on cloud computing, AI, DevOps, backend APIs, web development, and emerging developer technologies. The event brings together thousands of developers, engineers, software architects, and tech leaders for hands‑on learning, networking, and innovation. DeveloperWeek combines both in‑person sessions in San Jose and live online participation, offering broad access to its global developer community. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

name: Dreamforce San Francisco
description: Dreamforce San Francisco is Salesforce’s flagship annual technology conference, bringing together enterprise leaders, developers, administrators, and partners from around the world. The event focuses on cloud computing, artificial intelligence, analytics, product innovation, security, and leadership. Dreamforce features high-profile keynote sessions, hands-on workshops, product announcements, and extensive networking opportunities across the Salesforce ecosystem.

name: Game Developers Conference
description: The Game Developers Conference (GDC) is the largest annual gathering of professional video game developers, featuring talks, workshops, and an expo.

name: GDG Abuja
description: GDG Abuja is a Google Developer Group community that hosts meetups, workshops, tech talks, and DevFest activities focused on Google technologies including Android, Web, Firebase, Cloud, AI, and community-driven learning.

name: GDG DevFest Lagos
description: DevFest Lagos is a flagship GDG developer conference bringing together developers, designers and product professionals to learn about Google technologies, network and collaborate.

name: Google Cloud Next
description: Google Cloud Next is Google's annual conference showcasing innovations in cloud computing, AI, data analytics, and enterprise security.

name: Google I/O
description: Google I/O is Google’s flagship developer conference, held annually in Mountain View. It gathers developers, engineers, and tech‑enthusiasts worldwide to explore the latest in Android, web, cloud, AI, and more. Expect keynote announcements, technical sessions, hands‑on codelabs, and deep dives into Google’s evolving ecosystem — all delivered by top Google engineers and global experts.

name: Google I/O Mountain View
description: Google I/O Mountain View is Google’s annual flagship developer conference, held at the Shoreline Amphitheatre in California. The event focuses on web technologies, Android, artificial intelligence, machine learning, cloud computing, and Firebase. Google I/O features major product announcements, technical keynotes, hands-on developer sessions, and workshops led by Google engineers, offering insights into the future of Google platforms and tools.

name: JSConf Asia
description: A top JavaScript conference in Asia, bringing together international experts and developers to explore modern web technologies.

name: JSConf India
description: India's premier JavaScript conference, featuring talks from global and local JS experts.

name: JSNation
description: A leading JavaScript conference in Amsterdam featuring top JS frameworks, libraries, and tools.

name: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon

organizer.name: Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) / The Linux Foundation

description: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon is the Cloud Native Computing Foundation’s (CNCF) flagship conference, bringing together adopters and developers of open source and cloud native technologies. The event focuses on Kubernetes, Prometheus, Envoy, and the entire cloud native ecosystem, with key themes covering platform engineering, AI integration, security, and GitOps. Ticket pricing reflects the range from the student/academic pass (min) to the corporate all-access pass (max), which includes co-located events.

name: LeadDev New York
description: LeadDev New York is a conference for engineering managers and technical leaders, focusing on leadership, culture, and scaling teams.

name: LiverpoolJS
description: LiverpoolJS is a JavaScript-focused meetup for developers in the Liverpool area. The event features talks, workshops, and community discussions around JavaScript, frontend development, Node.js, TypeScript, and the broader modern web ecosystem.

name: Microsoft Build
description: Microsoft Build is the flagship developer conference by Microsoft, showcasing the latest in cloud, AI, and developer tools through keynotes, technical sessions, and hands-on labs.

name: Mobile World Congress Barcelona
description: MWC Barcelona is the largest and most influential event for the global mobile ecosystem. Hosted by the GSMA, it brings together mobile operators, device manufacturers, technology providers, and innovators to discuss the future of connectivity, 5G, intelligent infrastructure, FinTech, and enterprise AI. The event features major keynote speeches, expansive exhibitions, and high-level networking. The ticket cost range reflects the difference between the standard 'Exhibition Pass' (min) and the high-end 'VIP Pass' for executives (max).

name: Money20/20 USA
description: Money20/20 USA is a leading fintech event covering payments, banking, crypto, and financial innovation with global executives, startups, and regulators.

name: NDC Sydney
description: NDC Sydney is a premier software development conference that brings together developers, engineers, and tech professionals from around the world. Covering topics such as cloud computing, DevOps, and modern web development, the event features top industry speakers, hands-on workshops, and in-depth technical sessions.

name: NeurIPS
description: NeurIPS is a leading AI and machine learning research conference featuring peer-reviewed papers, workshops, and tutorials, with strong academic and industry participation.

name: NodeConf Argentina
description: NodeConf Argentina is a community-driven Node.js conference held annually in Buenos Aires. It brings together developers from across Latin America and beyond to explore the latest in Node.js, JavaScript, backend development, and the open-source ecosystem.

name: Norwegian Developers Conference (NDC Oslo)
description: NDC Oslo is one of Europe's leading developer conferences, bringing together software engineers, DevOps professionals, and cloud experts for five days of workshops, talks, and networking. Hosted annually in Oslo, it features top international speakers and deep technical sessions across a wide range of modern software development topics.

name: NVIDIA GTC
description: NVIDIA GTC is the world's premier AI and accelerated computing conference, uniting developers, researchers, and business leaders. It features the annual keynote by CEO Jensen Huang and focuses on breakthroughs in Generative AI, robotics, physical AI, data science, and accelerated computing (GPUs). The event is primarily virtual, with a large in-person component, reflected in the wide attendee size and ticket cost range (free for the virtual pass, up to $3,500 for full workshops).

name: PyCon Canada
description: PyCon Canada is a welcoming, community-driven conference held annually in Toronto. It brings together developers, data scientists, educators, and enthusiasts to share knowledge through talks, tutorials, and networking—all in both English and French.

name: PyCon JP
description: Japan’s largest Python conference featuring bilingual (Japanese and English) sessions, technical talks, workshops, and active community engagement.

name: PyCon US Pittsburgh
description: PyCon US Pittsburgh is the largest annual gathering of the global Python community, organized by the Python Software Foundation. The conference focuses on software engineering, backend and web development, data science, machine learning, DevOps, and security using Python. PyCon US features keynote talks, technical sessions, tutorials, sprints, and community events that support open-source collaboration, learning, and professional growth.

name: QCon New York
description: QCon New York is a practitioner-driven conference for senior technical leaders. It focuses on emerging trends and best practices in DevOps, and backend development, with real-world insights from expert speakers.

name: QCon San Francisco
description: QCon San Francisco is a practitioner-driven conference for senior software engineers and architects, focusing on emerging trends and best practices.

name: React Advanced London
description: A React and frontend engineering conference featuring advanced talks, workshops, and community events.

name: React India
description: React India is a premier conference that brings together React enthusiasts from around the world for expert talks, workshops, and community-driven events on the shores of Goa.

name: React Native Nigeria Conference
description: React Native Nigeria is a community-driven conference focused on React Native, cross-platform mobile development, JavaScript, and the African mobile ecosystem. It brings developers together for talks, workshops, networking, and collaboration.

name: RSA Conference
description: RSA Conference is a major cybersecurity event featuring keynotes, sessions, and an expo focusing on security, appsec, privacy, and compliance trends and solutions.

name: SIGGRAPH
description: SIGGRAPH is the premier conference on computer graphics and interactive techniques, showcasing innovations in 3D, AR/VR, AI, and more through talks, courses, and an extensive exhibition.

name: Slush Helsinki
description: Slush Helsinki is a leading global startup and technology event in Finland. It connects founders, investors, and innovators to share insights, showcase startups, and discuss trends in AI, machine learning, fintech, cloud computing, product management, and tech leadership. The event features keynote talks, startup pitches, workshops, and networking sessions to foster entrepreneurship and innovation.

name: SXSW Austin
description: SXSW Austin is one of the world’s most influential annual tech and creative festivals, blending interactive, film, music, and emerging technology showcases. Since its first edition in 1987, SXSW has grown into a massive global gathering of innovators, developers, creators, and entrepreneurs. The conference features hundreds of sessions, workshops, expos, and networking events exploring the latest in AI, software, XR, mobile, cloud, gaming, and digital culture, drawing over 240,000 attendees to Austin each year. The event also offers a vibrant environment for startups, industry leaders, and creatives to connect and collaborate across disciplines.

name: TechCrunch Disrupt San Francisco
description: TechCrunch Disrupt San Francisco is an annual technology conference focused on startups, entrepreneurship, and innovation. The event features startup pitch competitions, founder panels, keynote presentations, workshops, and networking opportunities with investors, media, and technology leaders. It covers topics including product management, tech leadership, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence, offering emerging companies a global stage to showcase their ideas and gain exposure.

name: WeAreDevelopers World Congress
description: WeAreDevelopers World Congress is one of the largest community-driven software engineering conferences in Europe, featuring global tech leaders and multi-track developer sessions.

name: Web Directions Summit
description: Web Directions Summit is Australia’s leading conference for front-end developers, designers, and digital professionals—focusing on modern web development, design systems, and accessibility.

name: Web Summit
description: Web Summit is a large global technology conference bringing together startups, investors, and enterprises across AI, cloud, security, and digital transformation.
